response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $800,000. This is an extraordinary chance to secure a high-quality product at a significantly discounted rate compared to its market value. We trust that you will find this offer compelling and hope to have the pleasure of serving you soon. Should you require any further information or wish to discuss this offer in more detail, please do not hesitate to contact us. Thank you for considering our proposal.", "product_price": 800000}
